grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 敏感【ビンカン】sensitive, alert, aware, susceptible
敏速【ビンソク】quickness, agility, activity
穎敏【エイビン】sharp (mind), keen, acute
慧敏【ケイビン】clever, of quick intellect
kun reading compounds: 聡い【さとい】clever, smart, sharp (ear, etc.), sensitive, discerning
